description:
Acute Subendocardial Myocardial Infarction (I21.4) 
 >>> ACUTE/NEW event happening NOW 
 >>> Rising cardiac biomarkers (troponin/CK-MB) 
 >>> New ST-segment changes on EKG 
 >>> Keywords: acute, STEMI, troponin elevation, rule out MI

Coronary Atherosclerosis WITHOUT Acute MI (I25.10) 
 >>> CHRONIC/STABLE coronary disease 
 >>> NO acute troponin elevation 
 >>> History of CAD, previous stents, stable angina 
 >>> Keywords: chronic CAD, stable, history of, known CAD 
 >>> NOT currently having an acute MI

Nonrheumatic Aortic (Valve) Stenosis with Insufficiency (I35.2) 
 >>> PRIMARY problem is the AORTIC VALVE 
 >>> Valve calcification, stenosis, or regurgitation 
 >>> Systolic 
 murmur, abnormal echo findings 
 >>> Keywords: aortic stenosis, aortic regurgitation, valve disease

Unspecified Congestive Heart Failure (I50.9) 
 >>> PRIMARY problem is FLUID OVERLOAD or PUMP FAILURE 
 >>> Reduced ejection fraction, pulmonary edema 
 >>> Elevated BNP, dyspnea, peripheral edema 
 >>> Keywords: heart failure, CHF, reduced EF, pulmonary edema 
 >>> NOT acute MI causing secondary failure
